text: A Shadow at the Window (Spanish: Una sombra en la ventana) is a 1944 Spanish crime film directed by Ignacio F. Iquino and starring Manuel Luna, Ana Mariscal and María Martín.Bentley p.95 It was based on a novel by Cecilio Benítez de Castro. ==Cast== * Teresa Idel * Manuel Luna * Ana Mariscal * María Martín * Francisco Melgares * Adriano Rimoldi * Jesús Tordesillas == References == ==Bibliography== * Bentley, Bernard.
